Description: Available September 1st - Charming studio on West Canton Street! Sunny unit has bay window with great views of the Hancock & Back Bay buildings. Custom birch built-in shelving & storage. Attractive birch Murphy Bed & fold-down desk. Compact kitchenette has granite counter tops, Gaggenau stainless steel appliances, small refrigerator, and electric burner top. Unbeatable location! There is no laundry in the building but ample laundromats in the area.
